001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.NotificationMessage;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlarmStatusRequest;
010
011import java.math.BigInteger;
012import java.util.HashSet;
013import java.util.Set;
014import java.util.TreeSet;
015
016/**
017 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlarmStatusRequest}, opCode 69, size 8
018 *
019 * <br>
020 *
021 * 
022 * <table border='1'>
023 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
024 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>69</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
025 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>8</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
026 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
027 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlarmStatusRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
028 * </table>
029 */
030@MessageProps(
031        opCode=69,
032        size=8,
033        type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
034        request= AlarmStatusRequest.class
035)
036public class AlertStatusResponse extends NotificationMessage {
037    private BigInteger intMap;
038
039    // private val unused, but placed to force java tostring to include the formatted alerts set
040    private Set<AlertResponseType> alerts;
041
042    public AlertStatusResponse() {}
043
044    public AlertStatusResponse(BigInteger intMap) {
045        this.cargo = buildCargo(intMap);
046        parse(cargo);
047    }
048
049    public AlertStatusResponse(byte[] raw) {
050        parse(raw);
051    }
052
053    private static byte[] buildCargo(BigInteger byte0uint64) {
054        return Bytes.toUint64(byte0uint64.longValue());
055    }
056
057    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
058        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
059        intMap = Bytes.readUint64(raw, 0);
060        cargo = raw;
061        alerts = getAlerts();
062    }
063
064    public BigInteger getIntMap() {
065        return intMap;
066    }
067    public long getBitMap() {
068        return intMap.longValue();
069    }
070
071
072    @Override
073    public int size() {
074        return alerts==null ? 0 : alerts.size();
075    }
076
077    public enum AlertResponseType {
078        LOW_INSULIN_ALERT(0),
079        USB_CONNECTION_ALERT(1),
080        LOW_POWER_ALERT(2),
081        LOW_POWER_ALERT2(3),
082        DATA_ERROR_ALERT(4),
083        AUTO_OFF_ALERT(5),
084        MAX_BASAL_RATE_ALERT(6),
085        POWER_SOURCE_ALERT(7),
086        MIN_BASAL_ALERT(8),
087        CONNECTION_ERROR_ALERT(9),
088        CONNECTION_ERROR_ALERT2(10),
089        INCOMPLETE_BOLUS_ALERT(11),
090        INCOMPLETE_TEMP_RATE_ALERT(12),
091        INCOMPLETE_CARTRIDGE_CHANGE_ALERT(13),
092        INCOMPLETE_FILL_TUBING_ALERT(14),
093        INCOMPLETE_FILL_CANNULA_ALERT(15),
094        INCOMPLETE_SETTING_ALERT(16),
095        LOW_INSULIN_ALERT2(17),
096        MAX_BASAL_ALERT(18),
097        LOW_TRANSMITTER_ALERT(19),
098        TRANSMITTER_ALERT(20),
099        DEFAULT_ALERT_21(21),
100        SENSOR_EXPIRING_ALERT(22),
101        PUMP_REBOOTING_ALERT(23),
102        DEVICE_CONNECTION_ERROR(24),
103        CGM_GRAPH_REMOVED(25,
104                "It has been 24 hours since your last sensor session ended, so your " +
105                          "current glucose reading now displays the last glucose value entered in the bolus calculator."),
106        MIN_BASAL_ALERT2(26),
107        INCOMPLETE_CALIBRATION(27),
108        CALIBRATION_TIMEOUT(28),
109        INVALID_TRANSMITTER_ID(29,
110                "The Dexcom G6 or G7 transmitter ID is invalid."),
111        DEFAULT_ALERT_30(30),
112        DEFAULT_ALERT_32(32),
113        BUTTON_ALERT(33),
114        QUICK_BOLUS_ALERT(34),
115        BASAL_IQ_ALERT(35),
116        DEFAULT_ALERT_36(36),
117        DEFAULT_ALERT_37(37),
118        DEFAULT_ALERT_38(38),
119        TRANSMITTER_END_OF_LIFE(39),
120        CGM_ERROR(40),
121        CGM_ERROR2(41),
122        CGM_ERROR3(42),
123        DEFAULT_ALERT_43(43),
124        TRANSMITTER_EXPIRING_ALERT(44),
125        TRANSMITTER_EXPIRING_ALERT2(45),
126        TRANSMITTER_EXPIRING_ALERT3(46),
127        DEFAULT_ALERT_47(47),
128        CGM_UNAVAILABLE(48),
129        FILL_TUBING_STILL_IN_PROGRESS(49),
130        DEFAULT_ALERT_50(50),
131        DEFAULT_ALERT_51(51),
132        DEFAULT_ALERT_52(52),
133        DEFAULT_ALERT_53(53),
134        DEVICE_PAIRED(54),
135        DEFAULT_ALERT_55(55),
136        DEFAULT_ALERT_56(56),
137        DEFAULT_ALERT_57(57),
138        DEFAULT_ALERT_58(58),
139        DEFAULT_ALERT_59(59),
140        DEFAULT_ALERT_60(60),
141        DEFAULT_ALERT_61(61),
142        DEFAULT_ALERT_62(62),
143        DEFAULT_ALERT_63(63)
144        ;
145
146        private final int bitmask;
147        private final String description;
148        AlertResponseType(int bitmask) {
149            this.bitmask = bitmask;
150            this.description = null;
151        }
152
153        AlertResponseType(int bitmask, String description) {
154            this.bitmask = bitmask;
155            this.description = description;
156        }
157
158        public int bitmask() {
159            return bitmask;
160        }
161
162        public String getDescription() {
163            return description;
164        }
165
166        public String toString() {
167            return name();
168        }
169
170        public BigInteger withBit() {
171            return BigInteger.ZERO.setBit(bitmask);
172        }
173
174        public static AlertResponseType fromSingularId(long id) {
175            for (AlertResponseType type : values()) {
176                if (type.bitmask == id) {
177                    return type;
178                }
179            }
180            return null;
181        }
182    }
183
184    public Set<AlertResponseType> getAlerts() {
185        Set<AlertResponseType> current = new TreeSet<>();
186        for (AlertResponseType type : AlertResponseType.values()) {
187            if (intMap.testBit(type.bitmask())) {
188                current.add(type);
189            }
190        }
191
192        return current;
193    }
194}
